name: Didier's Adventures
description:
Didier's Adventures is a language learning video game that aims to tell the story of Didier Larmousse and teach basic French grammar through interesting and engaging gameplay. 

Follow Didier on his journey between Normandy and Tournai, shipping orders, racing trucks and learning along the way. Collect stars and high scores to better your French and keep track of your stats in a customized account page. This is a tool for educators and students alike to enhance the learning experience and compare and compete through sharing their high scores. adding an incentive for learning.

This game was made in collaboration with TUDublinImpact and frenchgrammartour.com
